Description.Text:
Property Location
Conrad Dubai is centrally located in Dubai, walking distance from Dubai International Convention and Exhibition Centre and close to Dubai International Financial Centre. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Jumeirah Mosque and Dubai Mall.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 555 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature designer toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and irons/ironing boards.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take time to pamper yourself with a visit to the full-service spa. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including a 24-hour health club and an outdoor pool. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and a hair salon.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 3 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 2 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, limo/town car service, and express check-out. Planning an event in Dubai? This hotel has 28305 square feet (2547 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 3 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 2 bars/lounges.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Take time to pamper yourself with a visit to the full-service spa. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including a 24-hour health club and an outdoor pool. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and a hair salon.
Make yourself at home in one of the 555 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature designer toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and irons/ironing boards.

Conrad Dubai is centrally located in Dubai, walking distance from Dubai International Convention and Exhibition Centre and close to Dubai International Financial Centre. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Jumeirah Mosque and Dubai Mall.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Dubai International Convention and Exhibition Centre - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Dubai International Financial Centre - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Zabeel Park - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Jumeirah Mosque - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Lamcy Plaza - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Dubai Zoo - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Dubai Mall - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
KidZania - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Zabeel Stadium - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Burj Khalifa - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Dubai International Art Centre - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
The Dubai Fountain - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Mercato Shopping Mall - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Wafi City Mall - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
BurJuman Mall - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi

The nearest airports are:
Dubai (XNB-Dubai Bus Station) - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Dubai (DXB-Dubai Intl.) - 7.3 km / 4.6 mi

The preferred airport for Conrad Dubai is Dubai (DXB-Dubai Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

RoomType.text: Twin Deluxe Room with Skyline View + Free Wifi

Message.Text:
Essential Information:
All guest rooms are Non-Smoking rooms. Dubai Tourism Dirham Fee applies from 31.03.14 to be paid bythe guest directly at the Hotel/Hotel apartment. Following fee is applicable per bedroom per night- 20 Aed:5 star hotel/Deluxe hotel apart - 15 Aed:4 star hotel/Superior hotel apart-10 Aed :3 & 2 star hotel/Standard hotel apart-7 Aed :1
No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
